channel.title: Just starting off in Moparscape. Help?
channel.description:
Alright, I downloaded the game client. Clicked on server. It started sucessfully. I believe you type in any username and password and it registers and works? I get the error "Your account is already logged in. Try again right now, or make another name".
How do I go about just getting in the game and playing? I tried looking around for this error and simply how to get going but couldn't find anything.

item.title: Just starting off in Moparscape. Help?
item.dc:creator: @Microsoft11 Microsoft1
item.description:
@Microsoft11 wrote:

Hello,

Well, first I’d like to welcome you to the community! We’re glad to have you!

Second, If you’d like you can add me on MSN and I will walk you through every step.

Thank you, hope to help you soon!

Read full topic
item.source: Just starting off in Moparscape. Help?

item.title: Just starting off in Moparscape. Help?

How do I go about just getting in the game and playing? I tried looking around for this error and simply how to get going but couldn’t find anything.
